title: The Cyborg Scientist
quote: The only way forward is to sacrifice myself to save the earth
name: Martha
pains: Considered not fully human, struggling sense of identity

title: The Space Migrant
quote: I miss my family terribly but I know that this job will pay for their education so they do not have to do the same job than me
name: Selim
objectives: High salary, able to provide for the family
pains: Struggles to adapt to the Mars way of living, culture shock

title: The Earth Activist
quote: Why are we spending these thrillions of euros for Mars exploration? We need this money to save the planet Earth!
name: Maya
objectives: Echo of admiration from the earth activist movement
pains: Worried that this will lead to the end of planet earth
Struggles with the lack of fund to overcome earth-related issues such as dramatic pollution
